Luxe is more than just a salon for women.  We understand that men also appreciate the luxuriousness of a salon visit, which is why we also offer experienced Stylists for Men’s Cutting.

Men’s Barber with the Luxurious Touch

Each stylist at Luxe will take time to understand your needs through consultation. At Luxe we offer;

  • Both Modern and traditional styles
  • Relaxing Basin Experience
  • Advice on how to maintain and the look. Clay, Gel or slick it with pomade – we will guide you
  • Diagnosis of scalp conditions such as dandruff, allergies and eczema. We then recommend in-salon and take home treatments
  • Hair Loss? There is hope, Luxe have some of the best preventative cures on the market. Just talk to us.

Complimentary scalp massages are offered with every style cut, and appointments are taken by phone and walk in.

All bookings, consultations and general enquiries can be arranged either by phone, online or with the Luxe staff in the salon.

Luxe is more than just a salon.

At Luxe we curate and sell a large range of the world’s most exclusive and luxurious haircare brands such as Davines, Oribe, Kevin Murphy and Color Wow.
